title: Card: grey
code:
<gds-flex gap="xl" flex-wrap="no-wrap" padding="xl">
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="xl" max-width="300px">
    <gds-card padding="0" variant="primary" overflow="hidden" border="primary" gap="0" color="primary">
      <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="l" padding="l">
        <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
          <gds-text tag="h3" font-size="heading-m">
            This is a heading
          </gds-text>
          <gds-text tag="p" font-size="body-m" text-wrap="pretty" width="90%">
            This is the body text. Please make it your own. You can use a button when that suites the context, or seperate link. The heading can also be the link.
          </gds-text>
        </gds-flex>
        <gds-flex gap="s">
          <gds-button>
            Primary
          </gds-button>
        </gds-flex>
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card padding="0" variant="primary" overflow="hidden" border="primary" gap="0" color="primary">
      <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="l" padding="l">
        <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
          <gds-text tag="h3" font-size="heading-m">
            This is a heading
          </gds-text>
          <gds-text tag="p" font-size="body-m" text-wrap="pretty" width="90%">
            This is the body text. Please make it your own. You can use a button when that suites the context, or seperate link. The heading can also be the link.
          </gds-text>
        </gds-flex> 
          <gds-link href="#">
            Primary
            <gds-icon-arrow-right slot="trail"></gds-icon-arrow-right>
            </gds-link>
     
    </gds-card>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-card padding="xs" variant="primary" overflow="hidden" border="primary" gap="0" color="primary" max-width="300px" height="max-content">
    <gds-img src="https://api.seb.io/components/image/img.jpg" border-radius="xs"></gds-img>
    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="l" padding="l">
      <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
        <gds-text tag="h3" font-size="heading-m">
          This is a heading
        </gds-text>
        <gds-text tag="p" font-size="body-m" text-wrap="pretty" width="90%">
          This is the body text. Please make it your own. You can use a button when that suites the context, or seperate link. The heading can also be the link.
        </gds-text>
      </gds-flex>
      <gds-button>
        Primary
      </gds-button>
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
